Public MustInherit Class ServiceManager Implements IEnumerable(Of Type), IServiceProvider
public ref class ServiceManager abstract : IServiceProvider, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<Type ^>

summary.span: 实现 ，并提供对编辑上下文所提供服务的访问。

span.span: Implements and provides access to services offered by the editing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示主机提供给设计器使用的功能，或表示设计器用于使功能对编辑器内的所有设计器可用的功能。 represent functionality that is either provided by the host for the designer to use or that is used by the designer to make functionality available to all designers within the editor. 它是由 属性从 中获取的。It is obtained from the by the property.
